item.title: Making a Better Map Part 1: Getting Data with TidyCensus
item.description: Recreating a Visualization One of the many perks of having Data Science skills is being able to interact with statistics and graphs that you see in the news in a much deeper way. This weekendâ€™s New York Times included an interesting graphic on housing density and overcrowding in the Bay Area: My goal in this project is to 1) Recreate the original visualization using census data. 2) Build a function to generate similar maps for any region of the country.
